column4: hi guys... just wondering if anyone could be kind enough to help me with telnet or ssh
i can't seem to login to ubuntu machine from work
okay i did that, just typed in yes a few times
did you learn anything from it?
what exact command are you typing?
and its definately the IP of your home, and not a reserved IP? (ie 192....)
if you are not at home, you cannot possibly expect your lan IP to work
if your valid ISP IP address doesn't work, you have at least one of several problems: bad port forward, sshd is not listening, firewall has closed the port, ISP is blocking the port
do you have access to the target box right now?
i suspect your ports are not correctly forwarded, on a hunch
i ahve input forward and output policy
